text: The 2019 Butler Bulldogs men's soccer team represented Butler University during the 2019 NCAA Division I men's soccer season and the 2019 Big East Conference men's soccer season. The regular season began on August 30 and concluded on November 6. It was the program's 31st season fielding a men's varsity soccer team, and their 7th season in the Big East Conference. The 2019 season was Paul Snape's ninth year as head coach for the program. == Roster == == Schedule == Source: |- !colspan=6 style=""| Non-conference regular season |- |- !colspan=6 style=""| Big East regular season |- |- !colspan=6 style=""| Big East Tournament |- |- !colspan=6 style=""| NCAA Tournament |- == References == 2019 Butler Bulldogs Butler Bulldogs Butler Bulldogs men's soccer Butler Bulldogs
